name: FATE (itch) (pello)
description:
Avoid the incoming debris until you drop 20 probes. Use arrows to move and W/S to go forward/backward!

Gagarin was sent on a secret missionbeyond the oort cloud, propelled by nuclear detonations.

He has now passed the frontier ofour solar system

His mission: to set 20 probes and recollect datafrom the deadliest stellar object: a neutrino star!

He has to avoid incoming debrisand get as close as possible to the star.That will mean certain death, but alsoa massive achievement for soviet scientists!

The fatal fate of gagarin is now tiedto the glorious fate of mother russia...
